Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Leviathan Drive, between the Holy Order of Corellon Larethian on the west, and the Rodaisl Community Housing Complex on the east.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the intersection with Netherworld Lane to the south. On both sides of the street are large structures. The Rodaisl Complex houses many thousands of Oceancrestillians. Since individual houses for everyone can not be built in the city, the Housing Complexes were built to house the people who needed and wanted to live inside the city.
